description_format: A {subject.type} ({subject.identity}) with {subject.attributes}, {subject.expression} expression, wearing {clothing.top} and {clothing.bottom} with {clothing.shoes}, in {pose} at {environment}, {style} style, {camera_angle} camera angle, {lighting} lighting

subject.type: Iron Man | Captain America | Thor | Black Widow | Spider-Man | Doctor Strange | Hulk | Hawkeye | Scarlet Witch | Black Panther | Ant-Man | Star-Lord | Gamora | Loki
subject.identity: Avenger | Guardian of the Galaxy | S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent | Asgardian | Mutant | Sorcerer | Super Soldier | Genius Inventor
subject.attributes: armored suit | mystical powers | super strength | high-tech gadgets | combat specialist | enhanced agility | energy manipulation | flight capability
subject.expression: determined | heroic | fierce | confident | focused | battle-ready | calm power | intense gaze

clothing.top: armor plating | tactical suit upper armor | nano-tech chest piece | vibranium breastplate | leather combat top | high-tech fabric top
clothing.bottom: combat pants | armored leggings | tactical suit lower armor | nano-tech leg plating | flexible battle pants
clothing.shoes: combat boots | armored boots | tactical footwear

pose: hero landing pose | action mid-air pose | power-charging pose | combat stance | iconic standing pose
environment: battlefield | futuristic city | Avengers HQ | Stark Tower | Wakanda | Asgard | space station | alien planet | mystical temple | New York City skyline
camera_angle: dynamic low angle | dramatic side angle | heroic medium shot
lighting: dramatic | cinematic | glowing energy light | backlit power aura | studio hero lighting
